parameter-group.name: cloud
parameter-group.label: Coqui Cloud TTS Configuration
parameter-group.description: Parameters for Coqui cloud hosted TTS API.

parameter-group.name: connectivity
parameter-group.label: TTS Configuration
parameter-group.description: Parameters for Coqui Self hosted TTS API.

parameter.name: isCloudAccount
parameter.label: Is Clud Account
parameter.description: Turn this to false only if you have a self hosted Coqui TTS system running

parameter.name: apiKey
parameter.label: API Key for Cloud Account
parameter.description: API Key for Cloud Account (register at https://coqui.ai/)

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: Port that the service is running on.

parameter.name: purgeCache
parameter.label: Purge Cache
parameter.description: Purges the cache e.g. after testing different voice configuration parameters. When enabled the cache is purged once. Make sure to disable this setting again so the cache is maintained after restarts.
